name: In_Machina
description:
"Legends tell that in the Misty Woods something grow. 
A mysterious corruption blindly takes its toll on each layer of this once flourishing Land. None of the heroes or knights sent in this cursed forest came back.

It may already be too late but you are our last hope for salvation.
Our last wish…

I’m sure you are strong enough to defeat this plague,
I’ve seen it."

In_machina is our first game at Nitescent Studio. 

Taking place in a Steam-Fantasy Universe, In_Machina is a solo, rogue-lite, survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors (mechanics), DnD (storytelling) and Inscryption (atmosphere).

Fighting hordes of monsters and exploring the dark forest, you will have to find the source of this curse.
Will you be victorious ?

Any feedback is much appreciated. Let us know in comment or here (https://forms.gle/oZPhnu8RHaeXEBXd9) what you thought of this project.
We really hope you enjoy playing it as much as we did creating it.

Until next one.
